comment.author: 92494159@N03
comment._content: Around 1900-1920. Geysir (the name of the location, btw). To the left stand some people and they are following the steam

comment.author: 31883571@N04
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/92494159@N03] Actually the name of the geysir is Geysir. The name of that one has since stuck to all other geysirs.
